name: node-learn
description: Full-stack quiz application with NestJS backend and Angular frontend

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:packages && npm run install:services
scripts.install:packages: npm run install:events && npm run install:messaging
scripts.install:services: npm run install:auth && npm run install:api-gateway && npm run install:questions && npm run install:quiz && npm run install:achievements && npm run install:leaderboard && npm run install:admin && npm run install:maintenance
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:packages && npm run build:services
scripts.build:packages: npm run build:events && npm run build:messaging
scripts.build:services: docker-compose build auth api-gateway questions quiz achievements leaderboard admin maintenance frontend
scripts.upgrade:all: npx npm-check-updates -u && (cd frontend && npx npm-check-updates -u) && (cd packages/events && npx npm-check-updates -u) && (cd packages/messaging && npx npm-check-updates -u) && (cd services/auth && npx npm-check-updates -u) && (cd services/api-gateway && npx npm-check-updates -u) && (cd services/questions && npx npm-check-updates -u) && (cd services/quiz && npx npm-check-updates -u) && (cd services/achievements && npx npm-check-updates -u) && (cd services/leaderboard && npx npm-check-updates -u) && (cd services/admin && npx npm-check-updates -u) && (cd services/maintenance && npx npm-check-updates -u)
scripts.upgrade:all:install: npm run upgrade:all && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:services && (cd packages/events && npm install) && (cd packages/messaging && npm install)

author: danielrajmon
